com.ifeng.plutus.core.model.cache

类 PlutusCorePersistantCache<Result extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ifeng.plutus.core.model.cache.PlutusCorePersistantCache<Result>
  • 类型参数:
    Result - The object to to get/put, must implements Serializable

    public class PlutusCorePersistantCache<Result extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
    Persistant cache loader to get/put loaded cache
    作者:
    gao_miao

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PlutusCorePersistantCache()
      Constructor with default dir (sdcard) to get/put cache
      PlutusCorePersistantCache(java.io.File base)
      Constructor with file dir used to get/put cache

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void clear()
      Clear all cached files

      Get a cache object with the specitied key

      Check if cache coresponding to the specific key exists
      long lastModified(java.lang.String key)
      Get the lastModified time if cache exists, or 0 if cache is not found
      void put(java.lang.String key, Result result)

      • PlutusCorePersistantCache

        public PlutusCorePersistantCache(java.io.File base)
        Constructor with file dir used to get/put cache
        参数:
        base - The cache dir

      • PlutusCorePersistantCache

        public PlutusCorePersistantCache()
        Constructor with default dir (sdcard) to get/put cache

    • 方法详细资料

      • hasCache

        public boolean hasCache(java.lang.String key)
        Check if cache coresponding to the specific key exists
        参数:
        key - The key used to identify a cache file
        返回:
        true if specific cache exists, false otherwise

      • lastModified

        public long lastModified(java.lang.String key)
        Get the lastModified time if cache exists, or 0 if cache is not found
        参数:
        key - The key used to identify a cache file
        返回:
        lastModified

      • get

        public Result get(java.lang.String key)
        Get a cache object with the specitied key
        参数:
        key - The key used to identify a cache file
        返回:
        Result The cached object of type Result

      • put

        public void put(java.lang.String key,
       Result result)
        Put an object to persistant cache to refer in the furture
        参数:
        key - The key to identify the cache file, which should be unique
        result - The object to serialize to a file object

      • deleteCache

        public void deleteCache(java.lang.String key)

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear all cached files
